title: Transfer of heavy metals from soil to vegetables: A comparative assessment of different irrigation water sources
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 11

Author(s): Kiomars Sharafi, Abdullah Khalid Omer, Borhan Mansouri, Tooraj Massahi, Hamed Soleimani, Masoud Moradi, Kimya Parnoon, Gholamreza Ebrahimzadeh
